response.original_title: Godzilla X Boba Fett: Kill The Multiverse
response.overview: 'Godzilla x Boba Fett: Kill The Multiverse' is a film following Godzilla and Boba Fett as they face new threats never before seen, and old threats thought to be dead, facing the likes of Red Skull's AI army, while discovering the truth of their crowded and collapsed reality.
response.tagline: The title is as crazy as the movie.
response.title: Godzilla X Boba Fett: Kill The Multiverse
